SELECT
hpname hpaddr
FROM( select row_number() over(order by hidx desc) AS rno,
hpname hpaddr
from hospital
where lower(hpname) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
where lower(hpaddr) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
)H WHERE rno between 0 and 8 group by
hpname hpaddr

WITH B AS( SELECT count(*) as CNT FROM( select hpname, hpaddr from hospital where 1=1
and lower(hpname) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
and lower(hpaddr) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
)H GROUP BY hpname, hpaddr ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B

WITH B AS( SELECT hpname, hpaddr, hptel FROM( select row_number() over(order by hidx) AS rno , hpname, hpaddr, replace(hptel, '-', '') as hptel from hospital
where lower(hpname) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
where lower(hpaddr) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
)H WHERE rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno} GROUP BY hpname, hpaddr, hptel ) SELECT hpname, hpaddr, hptel FROM B ORDER BY hpname

SELECT hidx, hpname, hpaddr, hptel FROM( select row_number() over(order by hidx) AS rno , hidx, hpname, hpaddr, replace(hptel, '-', '') as hptel from hospital where hpname = #{hpname} and hpaddr = #{hpaddr} )H WHERE rno = 1
